summary: Completed comprehensive end-to-end testing of NoSmoke app. Tested all 5 tabs, user registration/login flows, urge logging, trigger management, progress tracking, profile management, and subscription system. Backend APIs working excellently (95.2% success rate), frontend fully functional with seamless integration.

minor_issues.impact: None - this is correct authentication behavior

ui_bugs.issue: Chart rendering warnings about width(-1) and height(-1)
ui_bugs.details: Charts display correctly but console shows dimension warnings

passed_tests: User registration flow - form validation and submission working
User login flow - authentication and redirect working
Today page - timer display, panic button, urge logging (resisted/smoked options)
Progress page - summary stats, weekly/monthly chart tabs switching
Triggers page - add trigger with type/description/location, view patterns
Insights page - daily tips, personalized insights, health milestones
Profile page - user info display, edit profile functionality, subscription dialog
Bottom navigation - all 5 tabs working correctly
Logout functionality - proper session cleanup and redirect
Backend APIs - 20/21 endpoints passing (events, triggers, progress, profile, subscription, insights)
Data persistence - all CRUD operations working correctly
Authentication system - JWT tokens, protected routes working
Subscription system - Stripe integration, plan selection working
